content.text: Edit the years to analyze. The years need to be separated by commas. E.g., 1983, 1984, 1991, 1997, 1998, 2002, 2003, ...
Edit the months to be included in the analysis. A month number must be between 1 and 12. The months need to be separated by commas. E.g., 1, 2, 3, 7, 8, 9
Check the years that you edited
Check the months that you edited
Ambiguous years. Year must be 4 digits
Month number must be between 1 and 12
